           Need help with your research?

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21821266">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21821266">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21821266">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21821266">
          <div id="boxatt21821266" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25298789">
              <a id="link_25298789" href="https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298789,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808438}); ">
               CIA World Factbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Information, including statistics, on the history, people, government, economy, geography, communications, transportation, military, and transnational issues for hundreds of world entities.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25298663">
              <a id="link_25298663" href="http://export.gov/ccg/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298663,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25142617}); ">
               Country Commercial Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Look no further than the U.S. Commercial Service’s Country Commercial Guides, written by U.S. Embassy trade experts worldwide….. An excellent starting point for everything you need to know about exporting and doing business overseas detailing 8 important weigh stations on your export journey.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25298234">
              <a id="link_25298234" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298234,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25298237">
              <a id="link_25298237" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com/content/title/routafricanhistory" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298237,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469712}); ">
               Encyclopedia of African History
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Covers the history of the entire African continent from Morocco, Libya, and Egypt in the north to the Cape of Good Hope in the south, and the surrounding islands from Cape Verde in the west to Madagascar, Mauritius, and Seychelles in the east.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25298236">
              <a id="link_25298236" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1UMT" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298236,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344702}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Latin American History and Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Newly revised and online, well-respected resource complete with recommended readings for further study.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25298235">
              <a id="link_25298235" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0OUF" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298235,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23470021}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Modern Asia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Online version of a six-volume survey of modern Asia, defined as extending from Japan in the east to Turkey in the west, and from Kazakhstan in the north to Indonesia in the south.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25298658">
              <a id="link_25298658" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.europaworld.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298658,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808405}); ">
               Europa World Year Book
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief statistics by country on a variety of topics, including: area and population, health and welfare, agriculture, industry, trade, transport, education, and more.
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25298672">
              <a id="link_25298672" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://library.cqpress.com/phw/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298672,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12809045}); ">
               Political Handbook of the World
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Information by country on a variety of topics, including: government and politics, constitution, foreign affairs, political and opposition parties, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21821267">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21821267">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21821267">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reliable sources of data
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21821267">
          <div id="boxatt21821267" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25298666">
              <a id="link_25298666" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.europaworld.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298666,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19903964}); ">
               Europa World Yearbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Demographics including health, welfare, and education.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25298240">
              <a id="link_25298240" href="http://www.imf.org/en/Data" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298240,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25298240}); ">
               International Monetary Fund
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. Respected.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25298238">
              <a id="link_25298238" href="http://unstats.un.org/unsd/methods/inter-natlinks/sd_natstat.asp" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298238,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25298238}); ">
               National Statistical Offices
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A directory of statistical offices of countries around the globe.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25298239">
              <a id="link_25298239" href="http://data.worldbank.org/topic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298239,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25298239}); ">
               World Bank
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. Good for media and communication, internet use, science and technology, etc.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21821268">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21821268">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21821268">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly literature
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21821268">
          <div id="boxatt21821268" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25298242">
              <a id="link_25298242" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298242,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25298241">
              <a id="link_25298241" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298241,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25298241}); ">
               Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Largely full text database of scholarly and trade journals. May include reports about consumers, target markets, etc.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25298243">
              <a id="link_25298243" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/econlitshell/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298243,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730866}); ">
               EconLit
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to scholarly publications in economics. Links out to other library databases, and to interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25298244">
              <a id="link_25298244" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298244,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25298245">
              <a id="link_25298245" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298245,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21821269">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21821269">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21821269">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Current news (popular)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21821269">
          <div id="boxatt21821269" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25298247">
              <a id="link_25298247" href="https://news.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298247,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25003617}); ">
               Google News
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Comprehensive up-to-date coverage from newspapers around the world.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25298246">
              <a id="link_25298246" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298246,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more, with coverage in the main from 1980 to present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5780716" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21821270">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21821270">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21821270">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21821270">
          <div id="boxatt21821270" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25298248">
              <a id="link_25298248" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298248,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25298248}); ">
               Trexler Library Citation Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief, easy-to-use guides to the 3 most used citation styles: APA, Chicago (Turabian), MLA.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25298249">
              <a id="link_25298249" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25298249,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Principles of Macroeconomics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25298249}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free citation tool. Does the citing for you! Loved by librarians, professors, and students alike.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
